original_text: Every beast, every creeping thing, and every bird, everything that moves on the earth, went out by families from the ark.
korean_text: 땅 위의 동물 곧 모든 짐승과 모든 기는 것과 모든 새도 그 종류대로 방주에서 나왔더라

sentences.original_text: Every beast, every creeping thing, and every bird,
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 짐승과, 모든 기는 것과, 모든 새는,

sentences.original_text: everything that moves on the earth,
went out by families from the ark.
